vclaim: Chase Bank deleted a tweet advising consumers to shore up low account balances by not eating out or buying coffee.
title: Did Chase Bank Delete a Tweet Taunting People Who Ask ‘Why Is My Balance So Low’?
subtitle: The bank created an internet backlash in April 2019 with a now-deleted tweet advising people to not eat out or buy coffee in order to improve low account balances.
author: Bethania Palma
